channel.title: About Server Making
channel.description:
How do you actually make the servers (i mean the files). Do you like upgrade some default source or what? And where can i learn enough Java for making servers (i mean the source).
P.S Dont go mad at me, im a total beginner at the whole RSPS thing :P

item.title: About Server Making
item.dc:creator: @Fabis Fabis
item.description:
@Fabis wrote:

Hmm making a private server from scratch would be too hard.
I barely understand anything that is written in the files, i donâ€™t think i could write them all up by myself.
But is there like any default source that everyone is upgrading? (except the 503 and 508 servers)
I mean all the Old Rs servs are the same, just with alot of upgrades.

Read full topic

item.title: About Server Making
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

How much java you need to learn depends on what you want to do. If you want to edit a server to the level of most current ones, just learn how to follow tuts and change strings (not recommended). If you want to make a good private server you will need to learn a good bit of Java and make a server from scratch, or use a source like Rs2dv (not wL or rs2e).

Read full topic
